name: littlelink
description: LittleLink is a customizable link page for hosting your own link-in-bio site similar to Linktree. It supports themes, icons, and self-hosting for complete brand control and privacy.
features: Link-in-Bio: Personal landing page, Multiple links, Social media consolidation. One link for everything.
Customizable: Themes and icons, Brand colors, Custom styling. Match your personal brand.
Self-Hosted: No subscriptions, Full control, Privacy-focused. Own your link page.
Simple Setup: Static HTML, Easy deployment, No database. Get started in minutes.
Icon Library: 100+ brand icons, Social platforms, Custom icons. Comprehensive icon collection.
Lightweight: Fast loading, Minimal code, Optimized performance. Quick page loads.
Analytics Ready: Google Analytics, Custom tracking, Privacy-friendly. Track link performance.
SEO Friendly: Meta tags, Open Graph, Structured data. Discoverable link page.
